thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Buckle Up, Prime Members Amazon Launches In-Car Delivery

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Buckle Up, Prime Members Amazon Launches In-Car Delivery
text:
Amazon.com Inc:
* BUCKLE UP, PRIME MEMBERS: AMAZON LAUNCHES IN-CAR DELIVERY
* AMAZON.COM - IN-CAR DELIVERY AVAILABLE TO CUSTOMERS WITH COMPATIBLE 2015 OR NEWER CHEVROLET, BUICK, GMC OR CADILLAC VEHICLE WITH ACTIVE ONSTAR ACCOUNT
* AMAZON.COM INC - IN-CAR DELIVERY ALSO AVAILABLE TO CUSTOMERS WITH 2015 OR NEWER VOLVO VEHICLE WITH ACTIVE VOLVO ON CALL ACCOUNT
* AMAZON.COM - AMAZON KEY SERVICE NOW GIVES CUSTOMERS OPTION TO RECEIVE DELIVERIES INSIDE THEIR VEHICLE
* AMAZON.COM - IN-CAR DELIVERY AVAILABLE AT NO EXTRA COST FOR PRIME MEMBERS AND IS AVAILABLE FROM APRIL 24 IN 37 CITIES ACROSS U.S. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
